mapper.select: SELECT COURSE_BEGIN_TIME ,COURSE_END_TIME ,MAX (NVL (DECODE (COURSE_DAY, '월', SUBJECT_NAME), ' ')) MON ,MAX (NVL (DECODE (COURSE_DAY, '화', SUBJECT_NAME), ' ')) TUE ,MAX (NVL (DECODE (COURSE_DAY, '수', SUBJECT_NAME), ' ')) WEN ,MAX (NVL (DECODE (COURSE_DAY, '목', SUBJECT_NAME), ' ')) THU ,MAX (NVL (DECODE (COURSE_DAY, '금', SUBJECT_NAME), ' ')) FRI FROM KOSMO.SIGAN GROUP BY COURSE_BEGIN_TIME, COURSE_END_TIME ORDER BY COURSE_BEGIN_TIME
